TextEng: "Time to turn you into scrap metal!"
"You're pretty well spoken, for a golem."
"Enough talking. Time to die, golem!"
"Help you? You golems have been attacking me everywhere I go!"
Text: "도와달라고? 너희 골렘들은 내가 가는 곳마다 공격해왔잖아!"

TextEng: "I should be going now."
"Why are you at war?"
"Who's Aghaaz?"
"Sorry, I'm not interested in this."
"I'd rather just kill you."
"Fine, I'll listen. But make it quick."
"What do you want me to do?"
"The Power Source?"
"I want no part of this."
"Forget it! I'm not your errand <boy/girl>."
"If I get you the Power Source, you have to help me." <StartAction>Tell Ferron about the Valsharess.</Start>
Text: "동력원을 가져다주면, 날 도와줘야 해." <StartAction>페론에게 발샤레스에 대해 말합니다.</Start>

TextEng: "Aghaaz is dead."
"Leader of the rebels?"
"Sentient golems? What are you talking about?"
"I'll be back once I have the Power Source."
"You should know something: the Maker is dead."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"Tell me about the Power Source."
"How long have you been here?"
"You've been here 500 years and all you've done is start a civil war?"
Text: "500년이나 여기 있었는데 한 일이 내전 시작이야?"

TextEng: "You waited for 300 years before you even decided to leave?"
"Despite your free will, you still think like a construct."
"See? If Deekin can make something of himself, anyone can!"
Text: "봐! 디킨도 뭔가를 해낼 수 있다면, 누구나 할 수 있어!"

TextEng: "Famous?"
"Tell me about Aghaaz and his followers."
"Tell me about yourself and your followers."
"Tell me about the Maker."
"I want to ask you something else."
"Why haven't you searched for the Maker?"
"Aghaaz sent me to destroy you."
<StartAction> Tell Ferron about the Valsharess and Aghaaz's offer.</Start>
"You really think you could survive against me?"
"The Power Source?"
"I don't have to kill you. Maybe we could work something out."
Text: "널 죽일 필요는 없어. 어떻게 해결할 수 있을지도 몰라."

TextEng: "Aghaaz is dead."
"I have the Power Source. Take it."
"Don't forget: I need your help against the Valsharess."
Text: "잊지 마. 발샤레스에 맞서 네 도움이 필요해."
